author: ryanleeschneider
content: try `sudo -u goeth ls -al /home/t730/consensus-deployment-ansible/kintsugi-testnet/custom_config_data/genesis.json` maybe `goeth` doesn't have access to parent dir?

author: ohraemez
content: are you guys using a dedicated el client for each cl client? I have teku-nethermind, nimbus-geth and besu-lighthouse running and would like to setup lodestar and was wondering if it is ok for testing purposes to connect lodestar to the same geth instance that nimbus is connected to? as long as nimbus and lodestar are in consensus this should not be a problem, right?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Not atm, you need your own EL for every CL. Otherwise a race between them could mess up the EL
